properties.description: please refer to the NSIP Entity Message Topic Requirements  documentation

source:
%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_migration_db.vw_nsip_project

AS

SELECT

	NP.caseId
	,NP.caseReference
	,NP.projectName
	,NP.projectNameWelsh
	,NP.projectDescription
	,NP.projectDescriptionWelsh
	,NP.decision
	,LOWER(NP.publishStatus) AS publishStatus
	,NP.sector
	,CASE
		WHEN NP.ProjectType = 'WW01 - Waste Water treatment Plants' THEN
			'WW01 - Waste Water Treatment Plants'
		ELSE 
			NP.ProjectType
	END AS projectType
	,LOWER(	CASE 
				WHEN NP.ODTSourceSystem = 'ODT' THEN 
					'back-office-applications' 
				ELSE 
					NP.ODTSourceSystem 
			END) AS sourceSystem
	,LOWER(REPLACE(REPLACE(NP.Stage,'-', '_'),' ', '_')) AS stage
	,NP.projectLocation
	,NP.projectLocationWelsh
	,NP.projectEmailAddress
	,NP.regions
	,NP.transboundary
	,CAST(NP.Easting AS INT) AS easting
	,CAST(NP.Northing AS INT) AS northing
	,NP.WelshLanguage AS welshLanguage
	,NP.mapZoomLevel
	,NP.SecretaryOfState AS secretaryOfState
	-- Pre-application dates
	,NP.datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject
	,NP.dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite	
	,NP.anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific
	,NP.anticipatedDateOfSubmission
	,NP.screeningOpinionSought	
	,NP.screeningOpinionIssued
	,NP.scopingOpinionSought
	,NP.scopingOpinionIssued
	,NP.section46Notification
	-- acceptance dates
	,NP.dateOfDCOSubmission
	,NP.deadlineForAcceptanceDecision
	,NP.dateOfDCOAcceptance
	,NP.dateOfNonAcceptance
	--pre examination dates
	,NP.dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen
	,NP.dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose
	,NP.extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
	,NP.dateRRepAppearOnWebsite
	,NP.dateIAPIDue
	,NP.rule6LetterPublishDate
	,NP.preliminaryMeetingStartDate
	,NP.notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM
	,NP.notificationDateForEventsDeveloper
	-- examination dates
	,NP.dateSection58NoticeReceived
	,NP.confirmedStartOfExamination
	,NP.rule8LetterPublishDate
	,NP.deadlineForCloseOfExamination
	,NP.dateTimeExaminationEnds
	,NP.stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate
	--recommendation dates
	,NP.deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation
	,NP.dateOfRecommendations
	,NP.stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline
	--decision dates
	,NP.deadlineForDecision
	,NP.confirmedDateOfDecision
	,NP.stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline
	--post decision dates
	,NP.jRPeriodEndDate
	--withdrawl dates
	,NP.dateProjectWithdrawn
	-- Additional fields
	,NP.operationsLeadId
	,NP.operationsManagerId
	,NP.caseManagerId
	,NP.nsipOfficerIds
	,NP.nsipAdministrationOfficerIds
	,NP.leadInspectorId
	,NP.inspectorIds
	,NP.environmentalServicesOfficerId
	,NP.legalOfficerId
	,SU.id AS applicantId
	,NP.migrationStatus
	,NP.dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart
	,NP.dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose

FROM odw_harmonised_db.nsip_project AS NP
	
INNER JOIN (

    SELECT caseId, MAX(IngestionDate) AS latest_date
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.nsip_project
    WHERE LOWER(ODTSourceSystem) = 'horizon'
    GROUP BY caseId
    
) latest ON NP.caseId = latest.caseId AND NP.IngestionDate = latest.latest_date   

LEFT JOIN odw_curated_migration_db.service_user AS SU ON NP.caseReference = SU.caseReference

WHERE LOWER(NP.ODTSourceSystem) = 'horizon'
	AND SU.serviceUserType = 'Applicant'
## Table odw_curated_db.nsip_project spark table is created

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
view_df = spark.sql('SELECT * FROM odw_curated_migration_db.vw_nsip_project')
view_df.write.mode("overwrite").option("overwriteSchema", "true").saveAsTable('odw_curated_migration_db.nsip_project')
